org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.persistentcookie

Class PersistentCookieModuleWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.JaspiAuthModuleWrapper<org.forgerock.jaspi.modules.session.jwt.ServletJwtSessionModule>
      • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.persistentcookie.PersistentCookieModuleWrapper

  • public class PersistentCookieModuleWrapper
extends JaspiAuthModuleWrapper<org.forgerock.jaspi.modules.session.jwt.ServletJwtSessionModule>
    Wrapper class for providing Persistent Cookie functionality. Uses the Jaspi ServletJwtSessionModule for this. Provides wrappers over the modules functionality, and hides the underlying code from external users.

    • Method Detail

      • generateConfig

        public Map<String,Object> generateConfig(String tokenIdleTime,
                                         String maxTokenLife,
                                         boolean enforceClientIP,
                                         String realm,
                                         boolean secureCookie,
                                         boolean httpOnlyCookie,
                                         String cookieName,
                                         Collection<String> cookieDomains,
                                         String hmacKey)
                                  throws SMSException,
                                         SSOException
        Creates a Map of configuration information required to configure the JwtSessionModule.
        Parameters:
        tokenIdleTime - The number of seconds the JWT can be not used for before becoming invalid.
        maxTokenLife - The number of seconds the JWT can be used for before becoming invalid.
        enforceClientIP - The enforcement client IP.
        realm - The realm for the persistent cookie.
        secureCookie - true if the persistent cookie should be set as secure.
        httpOnlyCookie - true if the persistent cookie should be set as http only.
        hmacKey - base64-encoded HMAC signing key.
        Returns:
        A Map containing the configuration information for the JWTSessionModule.
        Throws:
        SMSException - If there is a problem getting the key alias.
        SSOException - If there is a problem getting the key alias.

      • getServiceConfigManager

        protected ServiceConfigManager getServiceConfigManager()
                                                throws SSOException,
                                                       SMSException
        Returns the config manager for the auth service.
        Returns:
        The authentication service config manager.
        Throws:
        SSOException - If admin authentication fails.
        SMSException - If something goes wrong with the operation.

      • validateJwtSessionCookie

        public org.forgerock.json.jose.jwt.Jwt validateJwtSessionCookie(javax.security.auth.message.MessageInfo messageInfo)
        Validates if the Jwt Session Cookie is valid and the idle timeout or max life has expired. Calls into the underlying Jaspi module.
        Parameters:
        messageInfo - The MessageInfo instance.
        Returns:
        The Jwt if successfully validated otherwise null.

      • getContextMap

        public Map<String,Object> getContextMap(javax.security.auth.message.MessageInfo messageInfo)
        Ensures the context map exists within the messageInfo object, and then returns the context map to be used. Calls into the underlying Jaspi module.
        Parameters:
        messageInfo - The MessageInfo instance.
        Returns:
        The context map internal to the messageInfo's map.

      • deleteSessionJwtCookie

        public void deleteSessionJwtCookie(javax.security.auth.message.MessageInfo messageInfo)
        Provides a way to delete the Jwt Session Cookie, by setting a new cookie with the same name, null value and max age 0. Calls into the underlying Jaspi module.
        Parameters:
        messageInfo - The MessageInfo which contains the Response with the Jwt Session Cookie.
